title: Windows XP SP3 x86 Ultimate Update Pack (Aug 18th 2008) (TPB)
description:
===================================================================================
========== Windows XP SP3 32-Bit Ultimate Update Pack August 18th 2008 ============
===================================================================================

This update pack installs every single update for XP SP3 since it was released.

The pack installs all Windows updates completely unattendedly, this means at no point will you have to press or type anything!

Each and every one of the Windows updates up to 18th August 2008 are compiled into just 1 program... (There are more than 60 updates!)

How to;

1. Launch 'WindowsXPSP3Updates.exe'
2. Press 'yes' to install the updates.
3. continue working whilst updates install silently.


This update pack contains lodes more updates compared to my previous update pack/s


What does this update pack install?


Windows XP SP3 - Critical updates

    KB890830: Malicious Software Removal Tool (August '08)
    KB928366: Security Update for .NET Framework 1.1 SP1
    KB931906: Security Update for CAPICOM
    KB936782: Security Update for Windows Media Player 11 for Windows XP
    KB941569: Security Update for Windows XP
    KB946648: Security Update for Windows XP
    KB949269: Security Update for Windows XP
    KB950762: Security Update for Windows XP
    KB951066: Security Update for Windows XP
    KB951072: Update for Windows XP
    KB951376: Security Update for Windows XP (v2)
    KB951698: Security Update for Windows XP
    KB952954: Security Update for Windows XP
    KB953838: Cumulative Security Update for Internet Explorer 7 for Windows XP
    KB953839: Cumulative Security Update for ActiveX Killbits for Windows XP
    Root Certificates Update (May 2008)

    KB935957: Update for Windows Media Player 11

    KB939683: Update for Windows Media Player 11
    KB944043: Update for Windows XP (v3)
    KB944882: Update for Windows Media Player 11

    KB946665: Update for Windows Media Player 11

    KB951618: Update for Windows XP
    KB951830: Update for Windows XP
    KB951978: Update for Windows XP

Windows XP SP3 - Updated Components

    KB926139: Windows PowerShell 1.0
    KB943729: Group Policy Preference Client Side Extensions for Windows XP
    Microsoft XML Parser (MSXML):

And many many more........


I will of course be seeding 24/7.


Enjoy, :)
